channel.title: _Index on William's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in _Index on William's Blog

item.title: Hugo A Fast and Flexible Website Generator
item.description: Quick Start Guide Create a blog folder hugo new site blog go in to the folder and modify config.toml for your github url vi config.toml baseURL = "http://<your-github-account>.github.io/" create new page hugo new about.md create new post hugo new post/first.md install a theme cd themes git clone https://github.com/xxx/xxx.git localhost server preview hugo server --buildDrafts --watch references https://gohugo.

item.title: Hugo How To
item.description: Hugo | A Fast and Flexible Website Generator Create a blog folder hugo new site blog go in to the folder and modify config.toml for your github url vi config.toml baseURL = "http://<your-github-account>.github.io/" create new page hugo new about.md create new post hugo new post/first.md install a theme cd themes git clone https://github.com/xxx/xxx.git localhost server preview hugo server --buildDrafts --watch references https://gohugo.
